channel.title: Too many players help
channel.description: Ok I've just dealt with it in the past but it's getting really annoying now. How do I fix the "too many players" error that seems to disconnect random people upon another player's login. I believe it has to do with a discrepancy between the server and the client sent/received data, and I believe it's a server-side fix. Anyone got a solution?

item.title: Too many players help
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

Ok I’ve just dealt with it in the past but it’s getting really annoying now. How do I fix the “too many players” error that seems to disconnect random people upon another player’s login. I believe it has to do with a discrepancy between the server and the client sent/received data, and I believe it’s a server-side fix. Anyone got a solution?

Read full topic
